sentences.en: ALL - STEEL BODY, sturdy, 14 gauge diamond plate. Tubular frame.
sentences.cn: 全钢坚固车身:14级菱形钢, 管状结构.

sentences.en: Blood incompatibilities can also result in tubular damage and severe oliguria.
sentences.cn: 血型不合也能导致肾小管损害和严重的少尿.

sentences.en: Process principle of reciprocating spray forming large thickness - wall tubular was analyzed.
sentences.cn: 介绍基底往复式喷射成形制备大壁厚管坯的工艺原理.

sentences.en: The assembly shall have a electroless nickel plated tubular copper body.
sentences.cn: 这种总成应该具有非电镀镀镍层管状铜阀体.

sentences.en: The characteristics of tubular transport systems for organic compounds are described in detail in Chapter 38.
sentences.cn: 肾小管转运有机酸系统的特点将在第38章详述.

sentences.en: The dough was formed into tubular grains by extrusion.
sentences.cn: 药团通过挤压而成管状药.

sentences.en: The glands of the stomach are typical simple branched tubular glands.
sentences.cn: 胃腺是典型的单分枝管状腺.

sentences.en: The optimal design of convergent channel of extruder tubular head was discussed.
sentences.cn: 应用粘性流体的基本理论,分析了聚合物材料在管材机头流道内的流动.

sentences.en: The tubular clamp device is made of thermoplastic material.
sentences.cn: 并且所述管状夹紧装置由热塑性材料制成.

sentences.en: The whole thing fits into a tubular box.
sentences.cn: 整个东西可装入一支管状盒内.

sentences.en: These epithelial elements arise embryologically from foregut endoderm in the process of bronchial tubular growth.
sentences.cn: 这些表皮细胞在胚胎学上把源于支气管生长过程中的前内脏叫内胚层.

sentences.en: They attain complex morphology, appearing as branched, tubular processes.
sentences.cn: 它们达到复杂的形态, 出现分枝, 管状突起.

sentences.en: This paper discusses the integrated production technolo gy of tubular me mbrane.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了管式膜一体化的生产工艺,并讨论了影响管式膜性能的因素.

sentences.en: Those catalysts are used in small tubular reactors.
sentences.cn: 那些催化剂用于小型管式反应器.

words.tran_cn: 把…装管；使成管状（tube的现在分词）
